entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. safran:FootnoteProceedsFromDisposalFromPropertyPlantAndEquipment, safran:FootnoteCapitalizedInterest, safran:FootnoteProceedsFromDisposalsOfIntangibleAssets, safran:FootnoteNetCashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivities, safran:FootnoteDecreaseConvertibleInstruments, safran:FootnoteIncreaseDecreaseOtherBorrowing, safran:FootnoteDisbursementsForAquisitionsOfIntangibleAssets, safran:FootnoteCancellationOfIncomeTaxExpenses, safran:FootnoteIncreaseDecreaseDebtForPurchaseOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment, safran:FootnoteIncreaseDecreaseDebtLinkedToPurchaseOfIntangibleAssets, safran:FootnoteInterestReceived, safran:FootnoteDeferredTaxLinkedToFairValueOfDerivatives, safran:FootnoteIncomeTaxPaid, safran:FootnoteInterestPaid, safran:FootnoteIncreaseDecreaseReceivablesFromDisposalOfIntangibleAssets, safran:FootnoteProvisions, safran:FootnoteDepreciationAndAmortisation, safran:FootnoteIncreaseDecreaseReceivablesFromDisposalPropertyPlantAndEquipment, safran:FootnoteDecreaseOtherBorrowing, safran:FootnotePaymentForAcquisitionPropertyPlantAndEquipment, safran:FootnoteImpairment, safran:FootnoteCurrencyDerivative, safran:CashFlowsFromOperatingActivitiesBeforeWorkingCapital, safran:FootnoteIncreaseDecreaseOfConvertibleInstruments All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 11,952,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-210000_extended should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 7,735,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role . This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of OtherReserves : -6 Decimals of Equity : -6 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500UIC89GT3UL7L24/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/safran-2021-12-31.zip/safran-2021-12-31/reports/safran-2021-12-31.xhtml 20229

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 12,713,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-210000_extended should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 7,835,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role . This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of OtherReserves : -6 Decimals of Equity : -6 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500UIC89GT3UL7L24/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/safran-2021-12-31.zip/safran-2021-12-31/reports/safran-2021-12-31.xhtml 20232
